data.eml:eml: A new species of Sphaenorhynchus (Anura, Hylidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Toledo, Luís Felipe, Garcia, Paulo C. A., Lingnau, Rodrigo, Haddad, Célio F. B. (2007): A new species of Sphaenorhynchus (Anura, Hylidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 1658: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179890
